## Project I

My project focuses on understanding how macrophage and smooth muscle cells in blood vessel interact to promote more fat uptake and turn to become foamy cells

To complete the project, I am using *in vitro* cell model to assess the cell-cell interactions.

## **Project II**

I am using cell models to evaluate fasting and non-fasting lipid fractions in promoting fat uptake in cells. The goal of my study is to understand different types of lipids in cardiovascular disease lipid risk prediction.
